<h1 align = "center">:rocket: iSpark :facepunch:</h1>

---

## [Require][1]
- `pip install pyspark`

## Install
- `pip install iSpark`  **or**  `pip install git+https://github.com/Jie-Yuan/iSpark.git`

## Usage
```python
from ispark import *
sc, spark = SparkStarter('/opt/BigData/spark').sc_spark
```


---
[1]: https://github.com/apache/spark
